snippet.title: † Escape from the Cursed Convent † Trailer PV
snippet.description:
——————————————————————————
Steam：https://store.steampowered.com/app/1142740/
Official Website：http://kimshyuengames.wixsite.com/escapeftcconvent1
Facebook：https://www.facebook.com/-%E9%80%83%E9%9B%A2%E5%9C%B0%E7%8D%84%E9%82%8A%E7%B7%A3-Escape-from-the-Cursed-Convent--108960777136218/
Twitter：https://twitter.com/kim_shyuen

† About this game † ———————————————————

Escape from the Cursed Convent is a derivative work of the manga
'Hengoku no Schwester'.
It is an adventure game, filled with rich storytelling which includes several gameplay styles such as qte, collecting system, puzzle solving and more.
———————————————————
